songs.title: Radio Radio Radio
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Pull over quick (Pull over quick, quick)
I need a quick fix (I need a fix, I need a, I need a fix)
Pull over quick (Pull over quick, quick)
I need a quick fix, I need a fix

[Verse 1]
You gotta catch a flight, you gotta split
(You gotta split, you gotta split)
You said you want a ride, you're gonna get it
I've got my foot on the floor, I'm gonna get you there quick
(I need a quick, I need, I need a quick)
You wanna say goodbye, you've got twenty minutes
(Ahh, ooh, ahh)

[Chorus]
We're steaming up the window
Only thing on is the radio (Only thing on)
Give it up and let's go
Only thing on is the radio

[Post-Chorus]
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh

[Verse 2]
You've got the chemistry, damn it, it hurts
(D-d-d-damn, d-damn, damn it, damn it)
Look what you do to me, God damn it, it works
(It works, works, works, uh)
I feel the engine below, oh, it makes me go
(Oh, oh, oh)
Let's crank it up a gear, you want it, you know
(Let's crank it, let's crank it, let's crank it)

[Chorus]
We're steaming up the window
Only thing on is the radio (Only thing on)
Give it up and let's go
Only thing on is the radio

[Post-Chorus]
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh (The only thing on)
Radio-o-o-o (Is the radio, is the radio)

[Bridge]
Lost in this stereo, playin' this private show
No better place for you and me to be alone
I feel you on my skin, you've got my heart racin'
I hear the clock tickin'
Ready, set, let's go, let's begin

[Hook]
Pull over quick (Pull over quick, quick)
I need a quick fix (I need a fix, I need a, I'm sick!)
Pull over quick (Pull over quick, quick)
I need a quick fix, I need a fix

[Chorus]
We're steaming up the window
Only thing on is the radio (Only thing on)
Give it up and let's go
Only thing on is the radio
Let's kick it off in the back row
Only thing on is the radio (Only thing on)
Give it up and let's go
Only thing on is the radio

[Post-Chorus]
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh (The only thing on)
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh (Is the radio)
Radio-o-o-o-oh-oh (The only thing on)
Radio-o-o-o (Is the radio, radio, radio)
